org.apache.river.test.impl.outrigger.transaction

Class SpaceOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.test.impl.outrigger.transaction.SpaceOperation

  • public class SpaceOperation
extends Object
    This class wraps four kinds of JavaSpace operations to get an entry, read, readIfExists, take and takeIfExists.
    Author:
    H.Fukuda

    • Field Detail

      • USE_NULL

        public static final int USE_NULL
        Transaction type. No transaction is used
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • USE_SAME

        public static final int USE_SAME
        Transaction type. The same transaction with writing is used
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • USE_DIFF

        public static final int USE_DIFF
        Transaction type. Another transaction is used
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpaceOperation

        public SpaceOperation(boolean useRead,
                      boolean useIfExists,
                      int txnType)
        Constructor. There is no default constructor.
        Parameters:
        useRead - if true read or readIfExists is used.
        useIfExists - if true readIfExists or takeIfExists is used.
        txnType - Applied transaction type. USE_NULL, USE_SAME or USE_DIFF must be specified. This parameter only affects to toString method.

    • Method Detail

      • getTxnType

        public int getTxnType()
        Get transaction type.
        Returns:
        number of transaction type.

      • isRead

        public boolean isRead()
        Check operation type.
        Returns:
        true, if read or readIfExists is specified.

      • isIfExists

        public boolean isIfExists()
        Check operation type.
        Returns:
        true, if takeIfExists or readIfExists is specified.

      • get

        public net.jini.core.entry.Entry get(net.jini.space.JavaSpace space,
                                     net.jini.core.entry.Entry template,
                                     net.jini.core.transaction.Transaction txn,
                                     long timeout)
                              throws net.jini.core.transaction.TransactionException,
                                     net.jini.core.entry.UnusableEntryException,
                                     RemoteException,
                                     InterruptedException
        Issue the selected operation.
        Parameters:
        space - target JavaSpace
        template - template entry to be used.
        txn - transaction object to be used.
        timeout - timeout value.
        Returns:
        got entry
        Throws:
        net.jini.core.transaction.TransactionException
        net.jini.core.entry.UnusableEntryException
        RemoteException
        InterruptedException

        Returns string expression of this operation.
